item.title: Documentation
item.description: Introduction This is the documentation page for my CSC 2464 final project. There is information for the project outline, a brief description, schematics, and future ideas for the project. Project Outline The idea for the project started with a simple addition to the painting app project of adding customizable colors with the use of an arduino board and potentiometers. The goal was to provide an alternative way to explore human-machine interactions.
